about_the_game:
0one's Colorprints #9: Woodland Glades


Map Module for Fantasy Grounds

Four gorgeous maps for you to enhance your wilderness encounters. Set your deadly traps in the orcs' encampment, place your spectral undead in the ruined manor, challenge your players with the enigmatic lake hermit or let them face the cultists in the monolith glade.

This Colorprint contains the following maps:

Hermit's Hut
Deep in the woods lives an hermit who built an hut over an ancient pond. It is said that a sunken temple is hidden below the murky waters but no one has seen it yet...

Ruined Manor
The ruined manor once belonged to a wealthy duke who was a powerful sorcerer too. The goblins of the forest attacked the manor more than once and eventually managed to plunder it and burn it to ashes, thanks to the betrayal of one of the most trusted duke' servant. Before his death, the duke cursed the betrayer and doomed him...

Orc Camp
The famed Crashed Skull orc warband shifts from place to place in the woods. They often build a camp in a woodland glade and stay for few days before shifting again. The orcs are marauders and they raid the nearby hamlets kidnapping people to sell them to slavers...

The Monolith
The alien black monolith rises on the top of an ancient ziggurat. Nobody knows who built the ziggurat or the monolith but both exude pure evil. A group of evil cultist found a name, engraved at the base of the monolith...

Each map is linked within a an easy to follow outline story entry, with links to the map in mutliple resolutions.

Fantasy Grounds Conversion by 0one Games

Released on February 05, 2010. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
